message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you wanting to make a deal.  However, $120 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at the moment.  I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm still confident that this product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $115.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $115 is still a bit higher than I can go right now. I'm going to stick with my previous offer of $105. If you're willing to meet me there, I'm ready to buy.

I understand that you're sticking to your original offer of $105, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to give up on getting a better deal. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $112.50. That's the best I can do.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you consider coming down to $110? I think that's a fair compromise, and it would allow us to close the deal.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm still not willing to give up on getting a better deal. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $112. I think that's a fair price considering the value this product brings. Let's meet in the middle and see if we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm going to stick with my offer of $110.  I think it's a fair price, and I'm confident you'll find it a good deal as well. Let's close this deal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, I'm really trying to stick to my budget. I'm going to stick with my previous offer of $110. If you're willing to meet me there, I'm ready to buy.  If not, I'm going to have to consider other options.
